solution_line_template: He runs for {total_hours} hours because {num_movies} x {avg_movie_length_hours} = <<{num_movies}*{avg_movie_length_hours}={total_hours}>>{total_hours}
He runs for {total_minutes} minutes because {total_hours} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes}
